title: Mozilla 45.9.0 OS snow leopard
content:
I am broke and can't afford to buy a new mac now. My desktop works fine for a few minutes on private mode. But as I open a few windows, it crashes.

Is there a work around this issue?
creator: sansirita200711

title: Firefox on launch
content: So Firefox keeps removing all my pinned and old tabs every time I turn my PC off and on. It was good and working before a few days ago where the browser just reset all the tabs and went to the default tab with no pinned tabs and I couldn't "Restore previous session".
creator: thenewkiller26

title: Videos not showing in full (freeze) in my Wix site, while in Chrome they do
content: Videos not showing in full (freeze) in my Wix site, while in Chrome they do. They were OK before the last update. I asked a rep in Wix and he said maybe the browser needed another update but I have the latest. Can you help? There is no crash report, the video just freezes.
creator: seeleymedia

title: After fixing preferences...
content: Hello! I can't play website games after fixing my preferences. I think I did something wrong. I think maybe something about java maybe? I'm not sure. I use waterfox...
creator: CharleneMatzke

title: Audio problem
content: The youtube audio on Firefox sounds muffled while it's not muffled on Chrome
creator: corruptedvanguard

title: uninstall and reinstall and keep all my info
content: M FF is really messed up. Too many pages do no appear correctly. I am not savvy and do not want to mess around. I would rather find which files to save for passwords and bookmarks and do an uninstall and a clean reinstall. If anyone is kind enough to give me a step by step on how do do this. Firstly which files do I save fore mym bookmarks and passowrd, after I have those files I guess I can uninstall and reinstall then replace those. Thanks
creator: ffuser2021

title: gmail
content: I have been having problems with my gmail account for a while. Firefox has problems with connecting with my gmail account (message: not online, trying to connect.....) Other browsers don't have this problem. I still prefer Firefox, but I need to solve this issue......
creator: agathe.hb

title: Firefox won't load SCORM modules
content: As a Teacher I load SCORM modules into Canvas. Up to last May they all worked just fine. School just started and I'm now finding my SCORM modules will not open with Firefox. If I use Chrome they work just fine. I have refreshed Firefox and also gone into troubleshooting mode. They still won't load. They do load when played directly from my hard drive. I can't help that some security feature in a newer version of Firefox is blocking this.
creator: Tom-Brox
